name: inspect
description: Inspect Discord data about specific users, channels, roles, etc.

options.name: user
options.description: Inspect Discord data about a user

options.name: user
options.description: The user to inspect, default you

options.name: channel
options.description: Inspect Discord data about a channel

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to inspect, default current channel

options.name: role
options.description: Inspect Discord data about a role
